verses.roman:
pūrve yaiche kurukṣetre saba gopī-gaṇa
kṛṣṇera darśana pāñā ānandita mana

synonyms: pūrve yaiche—as previously; kuru-kṣetre—in the holy place known as Kurukṣetra; saba gopī-gaṇa—all the gopīs of Vṛndāvana; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; dar-śana—interview; pāñā—getting; ānandita mana—very much pleased within the mind.
translation: Formerly, all the gopīs of Vṛndāvana were very pleased when they met with Kṛṣṇa in the holy place Kurukṣetra.
